depositRateIndexNow(address).details: This is an looking forward estimation from last checkpoint and not the exactly rate that the user will pay or earn. sichaoy: to make the notation consistent, change the name from depositRateIndexNow to depositRateIndexCurrent

getBorrowAccruedRate(address,uint256).details: This function should always be called after current block is set as a new rateIndex point.

params._borrowRateRecordStart: the start block of the interval

getBorrowRatePerBlock(address).return: the borrow rate for the current block

getDepositAccruedRate(address,uint256).details: This function should always be called after current block is set as a new rateIndex point.

params._depositRateRecordStart: the start block of the interval

getDepositRatePerBlock(address).return: deposite rate of blocks before the current block

newRateIndexCheckpoint(address).details: The rate set at the checkpoint is the rate from the last checkpoint to this checkpoint

withdraw(address,address,uint256).return: The actually amount withdrawed, which will be the amount requested minus the commission fee.

borrowRateIndexNow(address).notice: Calculate a token borrow rate of current block

depositRateIndexNow(address).notice: Calculate a token deposite rate of current block

getBorrowAccruedRate(address,uint256).notice: Get the cummulative borrow rate in a block interval ending in current block

getBorrowRatePerBlock(address).notice: Get the borrowing interest rate Borrowing interest rate.

getCapitalCompoundRatio(address).notice: Ratio of the capital in Compound

getCapitalUtilizationRatio(address).notice: Get capital utilization. Capital Utilization Rate (U )= total loan outstanding / Total market deposit

getDepositAccruedRate(address,uint256).notice: It's a utility function. Get the cummulative deposit rate in a block interval ending in current block

getDepositRatePerBlock(address).notice: Get Deposit Rate.  Deposit APR = (Borrow APR * Utilization Rate (U) +  Compound Supply Rate * Capital Compound Ratio (C) )* (1- DeFiner Community Fund Ratio (D)). The scaling is 10 ** 18 sichaoy: make sure the ratePerBlock is zero if both U and C are zero.

getTokenState(address).notice: Get the state of the given token

getTotalDepositStore(address).notice: Total amount of the token in Saving account

newRateIndexCheckpoint(address).notice: Set a new rate index checkpoint.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw a token from an address
